title: Saratoga Springs Commissioner of Finance announces public forum - The Saratogian
content: Saratoga Springs Commissioner of Finance announces public forum  The Saratogian
description: SARATOGA SPRINGS, N.Y. — Commissioner of Finance Minita Sanghvi will host a public forum on city finances on Feb. 7, from 5:30 to 6:30 p.m. City residents may use this link to register: “I wanted t…
